result.reason: Feature request to add a tab ordering option that keeps tabs sorted in connection tree order, complementing the existing 'open to right of current tab' option.
result.approach: Add a new tab ordering mode enum (TreeOrder) alongside existing behavior. When opening a connection, find its position in the connection tree, then insert the tab at the corresponding sorted position among already-open tabs. Add a radio/checkbox option in Options > Tabs & Panels page.
